hint: there is a pursue going on on the road and suddenly the sowing machine sows right across the road
koohiiStory1: In association with consummate (#540), our sow is on the road pursuing a mate.
koohiiStory2: The pig is on the road in the pursue of the turtle who is trying to escape (#283). (See story on escape (#283) & consummate (#540)).
myStory: theo đuổi. heo chạy đuổi theo
